name: Projekt 5410
description:
Projekt 5410 is the scrolling shoot-em-up game we wanted to make for a very long time.

The project is in an early stage of development. We're still experimenting with basic elements of the game, and what you see above is our test scene, not level meant for the final game!

We update the builds here as we progress with development - if you want to see the game develop and grow, follow us to get update notifications.

Controls
  • Moving around: WASD, arrow keys or left gamepad stick
  • Fire primary weapon: space or green button
  • Switch primary weapon: left ctrl or blue button
  • Fire secondary weapon: there is no secondary weapon yet.
